Dozens of holidaymakers on the west coast of the country had to leave the area as beach houses were swept into the ocean. Meanwhile on the other side of the Baltic Sea, Latvia continues to endure weather more reminiscent of autumn than summer. A violent storm caused severe damage to crops and some houses in the town of Dobile, with trees falling on highways and roofs torn off by the wind.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: July was the warmest month on record, according to the European Climate Change Monitoring Programme, Copernicus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The global temperature was 1.5 degrees Celsius warmer than the pre-industrial average for 16 days this month and 0.27 degrees warmer than the average for July between 1991 and 2020. Records have also been broken for global ocean surface temperature and sea ice mass. This is due to marine heat waves detected in southern Greenland and the Labrador Sea, as well as in the Caribbean Basin and the Mediterranean.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: After a long period of unusually high temperatures in April, the ocean surface has continued to warm to more than 0.51 degrees Celsius above the 1991-2020 average in July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At the same time, Antarctic sea ice extent reached 15% below average, the lowest July extent since satellite observations began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The warming is expected to worsen in the coming months due to the El Nino phenomenon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Thousands of fans gathered on the streets of Bray on Tuesday to pay tribute to Sinéad O'Connor as her funeral procession passed through the Irish town.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Some threw flowers while others left handwritten notes thanking the singer and activist whose lyrics and actions touched so many people's lives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Her funeral cortege included a vintage Volkswagen van playing Bob Marley music.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: O'Connor was found dead at her home in London in July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: She was 56. Police have not given a cause dead at her home in London in July. She was 56.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Police have not given a cause of death, but say it was not suspicious.

sentences.sentence: At dawn on Tuesday, rescue workers resumed their search for survivors in the rubble of a residential building where at least seven people were killed the previous day by two Russian missiles in Pokrovsk in eastern Ukraine, a region where the Russian army claims to be gaining ground in recent days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The head of the UNESCO office in Ukraine has warned that buildings affected by Russian strikes in the historic centre of Odessa have suffered greater damage than initially estimated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Speaking in Kyiv on Monday, Chiara Detsy-Bardesky presented the preliminary conclusions of a recent UNESCO mission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Her team visited some of the more than 50 shattered buildings in Ukraine's Black Sea city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Chiara Detsy-Bardesky, UNESCO Mission Leader, Black Sea City From the visit, it is clear that the magnitude of the impact on the historic city center is wider than what initially expected?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Bardeschi revealed that Odessa's Transfiguration Cathedral, the House of Scientists and the Odessa Museum of Literature were among the worst hit sites so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: She also acknowledged their deep spiritual significance for the people of Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The detailed results of the mission will be compiled in a report to be published in December.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: China recorded its sharpest drop in exports since July 2020 last month, according to official figures released on Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Sales of Chinese products to foreign markets fell by 14.5 percent year-on-year in July, shrinking for the third consecutive month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The threat of recession in the US and Europe, plus high inflation, has contributed to sluggish global demand for Chinese products in recent months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Apart from a brief rebound in March and April, exports from the world's second-largest economy have been in constant decline since last October.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia plans to reboot its failed moon landing program for the first time in almost 50 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It plans to launch a lunar lander this Friday after multiple delays.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It will do so with a Soyuz rocket assembled at the Vostochny Cosmodrome in the Russian Far East.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Soviet Union's highly secretive moon landing ambitions were shelved in 1976, and no Soviet cosmonaut ever orbited or landed on the moon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia hopes Luna 25 will land on the moon's south pole to take and analyse soil samples and conduct scientific research.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: as the draw for the chance to become one of the richest people in the world is set for Tuesday night.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The country's third largest ever jackpot, worth the equivalent of over 1.5 billion euros, has continued to swell since the 18th of April, as no one has matched the Games' six winning numbers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: numbers. The nearly four-month-long unlucky streak could be all the sweeter for the person who finally lands the top prize, which is inching closer to the record lottery jackpot of more than €1.8 billion won in 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: France has made it through to the quarter-finals of the Women's World Cup after an emphatic 4-0 win over Morocco on Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Goals from Khadi Diattou Diani, Kenza Dali and a brace from Eugénie Le Sommer rounded off a dominant performance in Adelaide.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Captain Wendy Rennard's team will play co-hosts Australia in the last eight in Brisbane on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, Colombia kept their composure to edge out Jamaica in a fiercely contested battle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Catalina Ousme's goal in the 51st minute proved to be the difference between the two sides in Melbourne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This is the first time Colombia have reached the quarter-finals of the Women's World Cup.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: They will take on England next in Sydney on Saturday. A 22-year-old Greek football fan died on Tuesday after being stabbed in disturbances outside

sentences.sentence: Eight people were injured and there were 88 arrests after violence flared between home supporters and fans of Dynamo Zagreb, the visiting team.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Greek fans paid tribute to the dead man in social media posts and flowers were laid outside the stadium.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Champions League qualifier between the two teams was cancelled by UEFA.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The planned second leg in Croatia next week will now count as the first leg.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Athens will host the second leg with the date for the fixture still to be agreed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Legendary cyclist Federico Bahamontes has died at the age of 95. Known as the Eagle of Toledo due to his many triumphs in mountain stages, in 1959 he became the first Spaniard to win the Tour de France. Bahamontes was also the first cyclist to complete a career triple by winning the King of the Mountains crown in all three Grand Tours, Europe's major cycling tournaments. He retired from cycling in 1965, but in 2013 was named the best climber in the history of the Tour de France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The director of The Exorcist, William Friedkin, has died at the age of 87.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The horror film propelled him to worldwide stardom in 1973, but it was two years prior to that he won his first Oscar for The French Connection.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: That also won Academy Awards for Best Picture, Screenplay and Film Editing and led critics to hail Friedkin as a leading member of a new generation of filmmakers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Fans have paid tribute to him on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
